name: FIFA World Cup Quiz Challenge - How Much Do You Know? |   Soccer

questions.text: Which of these countries participated in the 1938 World Cup in France?
questions.explanation:
Dutch East Indies.

	The Dutch East Indies played in the first knock-out round against Hungary. They lost by 4-0 and were eliminated by this result.

questions.text: During the World Cup 1978 a player from Mexico looked remarkable because of his huge head of hair and his thick beard. What is his name?
In a legendary World Cup game Kuwait played in 1982 the sheikh entered the field because he disagreed with the decision of the referee to allow a goal. Who was the opponent of Kuwait?
In the 1990 World Cup in Italy, Holland played against the Egyptians in the first round. Who scored the only goal for the Dutch?
In 1954 Hungary achieved their best result ever in a World Cup. They reached the final, but lost 3-2 to Germany. Ferenc Puskas scored one goal for the Hungarians. Who scored the other?

In 1990 Cameroon beat the reigning World Champions Argentina by 1-0 (goal by Omam-Biyik), although they finished the game with nine players. Kana-Biyik got a red card. Who is the other player that was sent off by referee Vautrot?

Tragedy: Andres Escobar was shot to death in his homeland because he scored an own goal, which meant that Colombia did not reach the next round of the World Cup in 1994? Which country were Colombia playing when Escobar scored against his own goalkeeper Cordoba?
Who was the first Dutch player to score a goal (for Holland) in a World Cup finals tournament?
questions.explanation:
Kick Smit.

	Holland lost in the first round of the 1934 World Cup, knocked out 3-2 by Switzerland. Smit scored the first, Vente the second goal for Holland.

questions.text: What is the name of the linesman from Russia who decided that the legendary ball from Geoff Hurst of England passed the line in the 1966 World Cup final against Germany?
